meanings.definition: A type of brass made from copper and zinc.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman used latten to create a beautiful ornament.
meanings.sent2: The antique vase was crafted from latten, giving it a unique shine.
meanings.sent3: When the latten bell rang, it made a melodious sound that echoed through the room.
meanings.sent4: The latten jewelry gleamed like a tiny piece of the sun.
meanings.sent5: The latten statue stood proudly in the center of the square, catching the sunlight.

meanings.definition: To cover or plate with latten.
meanings.sent1: She decided to latten the dull frame of the mirror to make it more elegant.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith would latten the sword to protect it from rusting.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he would latten his shoes with gold to make them look fancy.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush seemed to latten everything it touched with a golden hue.
meanings.sent5: The chef would latten the cake with a thin layer of edible gold for a luxurious touch.
